text: Derekh eretz or derech eretz (Hebrew: דרך ארץ, literally "the way of the land") is the term used for "proper behaviour". Derekh Eretz may refer to: * Derekh Eretz Rabbah, one of the minor tractates of the Talmud * Derekh Eretz Zutta, one of the minor tractates of the Talmud * Torah im Derech Eretz, a philosophy of Orthodox Judaism * Derekh Eretz (political faction), a political faction ==See also== * Proper behavior precedes the Torah, a saying found in Midrash Rabba
title: Derekh eretz
